subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Now that Rory McIlroy and Rickie Fowler have taken turns at the tees for three days, there is a gap on the leader board: six shots in favor of Fowler.
snippet: Now that Rory McIlroy and Rickie Fowler have taken turns at the tees for three days, there is a gap on the leader board: six shots in favor of Fowler.
